conbody.p: AirClassroom was founded in 2016 to fulfill a need for extra classroom space both for Virginia Tech students and individuals in the surrounding area. With that target audience in mind, AirClassroom was born. It has succesfully provided classroom rentals within Shanks Hall at reasonable rates for a variety of purposes since its establishment and is hopeful for its future growth.

AirClassroom currently resides on Virginia Tech's campus in Blacksburg, VA. It operates within Shanks Hall, home to the Communications and English departments in the College of Liberal Arts and Human Sciences. The classrooms located in Shanks are well-equipped with modern technology for presentations and offer immense desk space for collaborative or individual work making them the ideal environment for all users.

Built with its customers at the forefront of the company's priorities, AirClassroom is committed to providing the best service possible. If you have any questions or concerns, please call our representatives at the toll-free number: 1-800-AIR-ROOM.
We thank you again for your interest in AirClassroom and look forward to the opportunity of working with you in the future!
